snippet: KAYE--Judith. The Trustees and staff of the Museum of Jewish Heritage- A Living Memorial to the Holocaust express profound sadness on the passing of Trustee Hon. Judith S. Kaye, former Chief Judge of New York State, a generous supporter of the Museum who, as the first woman on the Court of Appeals, inspired many with her leadership, ethics, and grace. Bruce C. Ratner, Chairman Robert M. Morgenthau, Chairman Emeritus 1/3
lead_paragraph: KAYE--Judith. The Trustees and staff of the Museum of Jewish Heritage- A Living Memorial to the Holocaust express profound sadness on the passing of Trustee Hon. Judith S. Kaye, former Chief Judge of New York State, a generous supporter of the Museum who, as the first woman on the Court of Appeals, inspired many with her leadership, ethics, and grace. Bruce C. Ratner, Chairman Robert M. Morgenthau, Chairman Emeritus 1/3
